section.name: Idea and Concept
section.p: An easy way to realize monitoring in existing or new Java based software projects. This monitoring solution reduces the complexity of software monitoring to a minimum. Developers have only to configure the Simple Monitoring Plugin in Maven project file (pom.xml). It automatically analyzes the control flow respectively data flow of your software logic and remembers the method calls and exceptions as measurement values.
The plugin configuration provides the following opportunities:

ul.li: definition of methods and classes, that should be tracked
choose if monitoring data will be saved local or at a central monitoring database
additional meta information about developer and department
